oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Overall view of K-25 Building and K-1401 Building from Quarry Hill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View of a large buiding complex from a rocky hill. Farmhouses are in the foreground and a smokestack is on the right.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farmhouses; K-1401 Building; K-25 Building; Oak Ridge Gaseous Diffusion Plant; Smokestacks
